Hi,
I get an exception when I duplicate (copy and paste) the line "private String
name = null;" in the following example. This only happens when class A extends
an unknown class and is already marked with an error. When I change xxx to
something known or comment "extends xxx" everything works fine. 

code example:

public class A extends xxx
{
    private String name = null;    
}
